business.headline: Want higher FD returns? RBL and Union Bank offer up to 8.5% to select customersAfter the latest revision, Union Bank of India now offers FD interest rates ranging from 3% to 7.15% for regular customers, depending on the deposit tenure (7 days to 10 years).

Zoho CEO Sridhar Vembu calls AI's impact on jobs 'small'Vembu pointed out that while AI vendors are promising big changes, real-world studies, including one titled 'Large Language Models, Small Labor Market Effects', show a different picture.

Sensex, Nifty surge over 1% as Reliance rally and FII buying lift marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex jumped over 1,000 points to close at 80,218.37, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 289.15 points to end at 24,328.50.

Trump's tariffs are raising recession fears. How bad could it get?Just three months ago, economists covering nearly 50 economies had forecast a steady, healthy pace of global growth. But Trump's decision to slap sweeping tariffs, including a 10% blanket duty on all US imports and a 145% tariff on goods from China, has upset those expectations.

Gold prices continue falling: What is driving the prices low?Gold is often seen as a safe place to store value during times of political and financial uncertainty. It touched an all-time high of $3,500.05 per ounce last week because of trade tensions.

New Income tax regime: Why is it more beneficial for salaried employeesThe new tax regime also offers a higher standard deduction. Last year, it was raised from Rs 50,000 to Rs 75,000 for salaried employees. In the old regime, the standard deduction remains at Rs 50,000.

Defence stocks rally up to 10% as Indo-Pak tensions rise. Should you buy?The Nifty Defence index rose by 4.5%, marking its biggest intraday gain since April 15, 2025. Out of the eighteen companies that form the index, seventeen were trading higher.

EPFO simplifies PF transfer process. Check how it impacts employeesThe new revision is expected to benefit over 1.25 crore members and will speed up the transfer of Rs 90,000 crore of PF funds annually, ensuring that employees can access and manage their retirement savings without any trouble after changing jobs.
Rupee ticks up, volatility expectations climb to two-year peakThe rupee was at 85.26 against the US dollar as of 11:00 am, up from its close at 85.45 in the previous session.

ITR Filing 2025: What's new in your Form 16? Here's all you need to knowForm 16 is a certificate that an employer gives to an employee, which shows how much salary he earned and how much tax they deducted from it on the employee's behalf. It's proof that your taxes have been properly paid to the government.

Explained: How Pakistan could lose millions after closing airspace for IndiaPakistan's decision to close its airspace to Indian airlines, after India's diplomatic move against Pakistan over the Pahalgam terror attack, is likely to cause disruptions on several key international routes, particularly flights departing from North India.

Ather Energy IPO: Should you subscribe or not?Ather Energy IPO: The IPO is a book-built offer worth Rs 2,980.76 crore, comprising a fresh issue of 8.18 crore equity shares valued at Rs 2,626.30 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.11 crore shares aggregating Rs 354.76 crore.

Sensex jumps over 1,000 points. 3 reasons behind today's stock market rallyStock market today: At around 12:20 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was trading 1008.25 points higher at 80,220.78, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 239.90 points to 24,279.05., while the NSE Nifty50 rose 237.10 points to 24,276.45. All broader market indices were also firmly in positive territory, signalling the potential for a strong session ahead.

Reliane shares jump over 4% after strong Q4 results. Buy, hold or sell?The Mukesh Ambani-led conglomerate reported a 2% rise in consolidated net profit to Rs 19,407 crore, beating analysts' expectations of around Rs 18,471 crore. Revenue from operations for the quarter grew 10% year-on-year to Rs 2.64 lakh crore.
Sensex, Nifty rally driven by Reliance boost and positive Asian market trendsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 558.35 points to 79,770.88, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 155.75 points to 24,195.10as of 9:47 am.

Ather Energy IPO opens for bidding: Should you subscribe? Check latest GMPAther Energy IPO is a book-built issue worth Rs 2,980.76 crore. It includes a fresh issue of 8.18 crore shares aggregating to Rs 2,626.30 crore, and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.11 crore shares worth Rs 354.76 crore.

Sensex, Nifty opening: Will stock market rise or fall today?The situation between India and Pakistan remains tense after the recent attack in Kashmir. This tension pulled down both the Sensex and Nifty on Friday.

Stocks to watch on April 28: RIL, IDFC First Bank, Mahindra, Axis BankVarious stocks are likely to see big movements today, April 28, as several companies are set to announce their quarterly earnings and other key updates.

India lifted 171 million people from extreme poverty from 2012 to 2022: World BankRural extreme poverty dropped from 18.4 per cent to 2.8 per cent, and urban from 10.7 per cent to 1.1 per cent, narrowing the rural-urban gap from 7.7 to 1.7 percentage points.

Changing jobs? Check this EPFO update on PF transfersEffective January 2025, the requirement for employer approval in most transfer cases has been eliminated. Previously, PF balance transfers required coordination between source and destination EPFO offices, often causing delays.

E-commerce, crops, data storage top India-US trade deal negotiations: ReportDiscussions will now begin on issues such as market access for US farm goods, India's data localisation rules, and the role of big tech in e-commerce—areas that have previously proved politically sensitive in India.

Indian airlines may face turbulence as Pakistan closes its skiesPakistan has announced shutting its airspace to Indian carriers as tensions rise between the two neighbours following a deadly militant attack in Indian Kashmir earlier this week.

Samsung to invest Rs 1,000 crore in Tamil Nadu plant: ReportSamsung's Tamil Nadu factory currently employs over 2,000 people. In 2022–23, the plant contributed one-fifth of Samsung's Rs 1 lakh crore sales in India.
Sensex, Nifty close lower as rising India-Pakistan tension spooks investorsThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 588.80 points to end at 79,212.53, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 207.35 points to end at 24,039.35.

Pahalgam terror attack casts big shadow on Kashmir's booming tourism economyKashmir was slowly rebuilding its image as a peaceful tourist destination after years of conflict, especially after the abrogation of Article 370 in August 2019.

Sebi revises cut-off timings for overnight mutual fund redemptions. Details hereSebi aims to make sure stock brokers and clearing members use client funds wisely by investing in secure overnight mutual fund schemes (MFOS).

Air India may buy 10 Boeing planes turned down by China: ReportThe ongoing trade tensions between the US and China, marked by steep duties above 100%, have impacted various sectors, even the aviation industry has taken a hit.
Pakistan Stock Exchange portal crashes amid rising geopolitical heatThe online portal of PSX showed a message saying "We'll be back soon," indicating that the website was temporarily unavailable.

Bengaluru resident shares costly homebuying mistake: 'Don't fall for FOMO'A social media user from Bengaluru shared that he has been living in Bengaluru for the past six years. Like many others, he moved to the city for better career opportunities. Despite being financially stable, he chose to rent rather than buy a flat. But the trouble started soon after.

Sensex, Nifty tank: Indo-Pak tensions trigger market crash. Check top losersSensex plunged over 1,000 points, while Nifty tanked over 300 points, falling below 24,000 as uncertainty prevailed over geopolitical tensions.

Apple plans to make all US iPhones in India by 2026: ReportThe said move is part of Apple's long-term plan to reduce its dependence on China, especially after the recent tariff rules announced by US President Donald Trump.

Ather Energy IPO: Check latest GMP as Rs 3,000 crore public listing to open soonThe Ather Energy IPO will be a book-built issue. It consists of a fresh issue of 8.18 crore equity shares worth Rs 2,626 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.11 crore shares worth Rs 354.76 crore.

Sensex falls 1,000 points: Why is stock market falling today despite early gains?Sensex and Nifty plunged more than 1% reacting to uncertainty over geopolitical tensions. The S&P BSE Sensex tanked 1,026.28 points to 78,775.15, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 330.40 points to 23,916.30 as of 11:41 am.
Sensex, Nifty erase early gains as markets react to Kashmir terror attackThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 492.29 points to 79,309.14, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 172.15 points to 24,074.55 as of 10 am.

Sensex, Nifty today: Will Dalal Street return to winning ways on April 25?Stock market today: Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,522 as of 7:48 am, which is about 1.1% above Thursday's Nifty50 close of 24,246.7.

Stocks to watch today: RIL, Axis Bank, Gensol, IndusInd Bank, Maruti SuzukiReliance Industries will announce its results for the March 2025 quarter today. The market will be watching closely for updates on its energy, telecom, and retail businesses.

ED raids Gensol promoters, detains Puneet Jaggi from Delhi hotel: ReportSources said the probe agency has invoked provisions under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) following findings of fund diversion and misrepresentation flagged earlier by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi).

Pay10 becomes first entity to go live on CBUAE's open finance frameworkThe new license gives Pay10 secure, real-time access to consumer bank accounts, enabling seamless third-party financial services. This sets the foundation for broader innovations in areas such as embedded finance, digital identity, and interoperable payment systems.

Kumar Mangalam Birla to receive Lata Deenanath Mangeshkar Award 2025The 57-year-old industrialist, Padma Bhushan awardee and Chairman of the Aditya Birla Group, is being honoured for his pivotal role in shaping India's growth story.
'Wives are smarter': Harsh Goenka's gold vs gadget lesson goes viralOn April 24, at 10.30 am, gold on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) was at Rs 95,893 per 10 grams, up Rs 1,171.

entertainment.headline: You Season 5 review: A disappointing, predictable goodbye to Joe GoldbergReleased-Thu Apr 24, 2025The psychological thriller 'You', starring Penn Badgley as the show-runner, premiered its season finale on April 24. The show concludes its journey with Joe Goldberg facing the consequences of his dark past while navigating personal turmoil. As the final season unfolds, familiar faces and new challenges emerge, questioning whether redemption or downfall awaits him.

Baahubali returns to theatres in 2025, confirms producer on 8th anniversary'Baahubali' is all set to re-release in theatres this October. On the film's eighth anniversary, producer Shobu Yarlagadda announced that the film will be back in theatres with new surprises.

Suriya's comeback quest: Will Karthik Subbaraj's Retro end the dry spell?Suriya is one of the most celebrated actors in the Tamil film industry. However, he hasn't had a big hit in the last decade. Will his upcoming film, 'Retro', help end his decade-long drought at the box office?

Suits LA Season Episode 10 review: 10 episodes and yet something feels unfinished Released-Mon Apr 28, 2025'Suits LA' Season 1 premiered its 10th episode on Monday (IST), and while it featured all the elements from the 'Suits' series, including the charismatic Harvey Spector, it never fully delivered.
Moments in Phule were pure gold: Rajkummar Rao praises Patralekhaa's performanceRajkummar Rao praised his wife Patralekhaa's performance in 'Phule'. The film released in theatres on April 25.
Actor Seema Pahwa hints at quitting films: The condition is very badActor Seema Pahwa hinted at quitting films. She mentioned how creative people have been murdered.

Gram Chikitsalay release date out: Amol Parashar leads series on rural healthcarePrime Video's new series 'Gram Chikitsalay', starring Amol Parashar, is set to premiere on May 9, 2025. The series, created by Deepak Kumar Mishra, promises a blend of humour and social commentary.

Who is Neha Singh Rathore, Bhojpuri singer facing sedition for Kashmir attack postsPopular singer Neha Singh Rathore is facing a sedition case over her statements about the Pahalgam terror attack. The complainant claimed that she made provocative posts targeting a religious community.

Subham trailer: Samantha's first production is a horror-comedy with a comic twistThe trailer of 'Subham', Samantha's debut production, is out. The horror-comedy features the actor in a hilarious cameo and will release on May 9.

Actor Makarand Deshpande leads peaceful protest against Pahalgam attackVeteran actor Makarand Deshpande led peaceful protest in Mumbai against the Pahalgam terror attack in a bid to extend his support to the government.

Hania Aamir gives shoutout to Badshah amid growing India-Pakistan tensionsPakistani actor Hania Aamir cheered for her close friend and rapper Badshah for his upcoming track. It was also rumoured that the two were dating each other.

Paresh Rawal accuses National Award of 'corruption, lobbying': It's all a gameActor Paresh Rawal opened up about the National Awards and shared that it is driven by 'aggressive lobbying'. The veteran actor added that he was made aware of lobbying and corruption when his film 'Sir' (1993) won the National Award.

Actor Shoaib Ibrahim responds to backlash over 'Kashmir vlog' post after attackTelevision actor Shoaib Ibrahim responded to criticism for sharing a vlog amid the Pahalgam terror attack, clarifying that he never meant to hurt anyone's sentiments.

Malayalam actors Shine Tom Chacko, Sreenath Bhasi questioned in hybrid ganja caseMalayalam actors Shine Tom Chacko and Sreenath Bhasi were questioned by Kerala Excise officials. This follows a drug bust involving hybrid ganja worth Rs 2 crore.

Harry Potter star Rupert Grint welcomes second child with wife Georgia'Harry Potter' actor Rupert Grint announced the birth of his second child, a girl, via Instagram. He and his longtime partner, Georgia Groome, named their newborn daughter Goldie G Grint.
KJo reacts to Delhi groom cancelling wedding after DJ plays Channa MereyaFilmmaker Karan Johar recently reacted to a Delhi groom who called off wedding after the DJ played 'Channa Mereya'.

Aamir Khan meets ex-wife Reena Dutta with partner Gauri, son JunaidActor Aamir Khan visited his former wife Reena Dutta's residence on Sunday. He was accompanied by his girlfriend Gauri Spratt and son Junaid.

Salman Khan's Big Shot UK Tour postponed after Pahalgam attackThe Bollywood Big Shot UK Tour, featuring major stars like Salman Khan, Madhuri Dixit, and Tiger Shroff, has been postponed in light of the recent India-Pakistan tensions. Organisers have assured that new dates will be announced soon, and refunds will be provided in the meantime.

Ajith Kumar and family arrive in Delhi for Padma Awards ceremony. WatchAjith Kumar, his wife Shalini, daughter Anoushka and son, Aadvik, were seen heading to New Delhi. The actor will receive his Padma Bhushan award on Monday.

general news.headline: Pak moving terrorists into bunkers after India zeroes in on launch pads: SourcesPakistan Army is evacuating terror launch pads across Pakistan-Occupied-Kashmir (POK), moving terrorists into bunkers after Indian agencies flagged 42 active camps.

New Pahalgam attack video shows tourists in a huddle as gunshots echo in meadowScared tourists, including women and children, can be seen huddling in the new video that shows the moment of terror attack in Pahalgam.

Large parts of Spain and Portugal hit by power outage, train services stoppedA major power outage has been reported in Spain and Portugal. Spain's public broadcaster RTVE said the power outage hit several regions of the country, leaving Spain's parliament in Madrid and metro stations across the country in the dark.

NIA's 8 questions to Bengaluru man's widow, a witness to Pahalgam terror attackBharat Bhushan's widow Sujata was questioned by the NIA in Bengaluru about the Pahalgam terror attack, including the reason for their visit to Kashmir. Revenue officials also visited the house to process the government's Rs 10 lakh compensation.

How Asaduddin Owaisi is foiling Pakistan's most diabolical gameplanHyderabad MP and AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi has ripped apart Pakistan in the Pahalgam attack. Owaisi's attack at a rally against the waqf law foils Pakistan's diabolical gameplan. The phrases Owaisi uses and his line of attack are unique even as some Congress leaders take a softer line.

Congress's 'gag order' after leaders' J&K remarks, says they speak for themselvesSources told India Today TV that Leader of Opposition in Lok Sabha, Rahul Gandhi, and Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge are upset with leaders speaking against party lines on the Pahalgam terror attack.

Pakistanis turn minister into meme over India remark, ask him 'kya phoonka'Pakistan's interior minister, Mohsin Naqvi's claim that India couldn't handle Pakistan's "growing economic growth" left Pakistanis themselves in splits. Flooding social media with memes, many asked their minister, "kya phoonka" before making such a bizarre statement.

Won't talk statehood at this time, I've lost face: Omar Abdullah on J&K attackExpressing deep grief, Omar Abdullah said that, while the restoration of statehood remains an important goal, he would defer raising the demand for another time and not make human lives a political bargaining chip.

How reelmaker for honeymooners shot video of Pahalgam attack from atop treeA local photographer, who made reels for honeymooners, has emerged as a crucial witness in the Pahalgam terror attack case. As the terrorists fired the first shots, the photographer ran for his life and climbed a tree, from where he recorded the massacre. He is a key NIA witness now.

Kaneria slams Shahid Afridi, calls him out for extremist viewsFormer Pakistan cricketer Danish Kaneria has hit out against Shahid Afridi after a video of the latter went viral on the internet. In the video, Shahid alleged that India killed its own people in the Pahalgam terror attack.

Putin declares 3-day ceasefire in Ukraine on May 8-10 for WW II victory dayAccording to the Kremlin, the ceasefire will last 72 hours, beginning on May 8 and ending on May 10. Russia has also urged Ukraine to observe the truce.

IPL to add 20 more matches from 2028, adopt full home-away format: Arun DhumalThe Indian cricket board (BCCI) is planning to expand the Indian Premier League to a 94-match season by 2028, revealed IPL chairman Arun Dhumal. Currently, the IPL has 74 matches spread over a period of 60-65 days.

Paresh Rawal drank his urine to heal knee injury: What doctors say about thisParesh Rawal said he drank his own urine, which he claimed helped him recover from his knee injury. However, medical experts strongly discourage such practices, warning of potential health risks.

Conclave to elect new pope to start on May 7: ReportSecret conclave to elect the new leader of the global Church will start on May 7. The date was decided during a closed-door meeting of cardinals at the Vatican.

A brief history of terrorism in KashmirTo trace the evolution of insurgency and terrorism, we revisit Kashmir's turbulent history from Independence through the violent 1990s, when terror dominated the narrative.

Congress leaders get BJP heat for backing Pak on J&K attack: Such brazen advocacyBJP leader Amit Malviya criticised Congress leaders Saifuddin Soz and Tariq Karra for their comments on India's countermeasures after the Pahalgam attack.

Bumrah's wife Sanjana slams trolls: Angad is not a topic for your entertainmentIndia fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah's wife Sanjana Ganesan has lashed out at trolls over insensitive remarks for their son Angad. Sanjana was in attendance with her son for Mumbai Indians' game against Lucknow Super Giants.

RSS student wing finally breaches Left citadel JNUIn a historic breakthrough, the RSS's student wing, the ABVP, has stormed into the JNU's power corridors with its biggest-ever haul of 23 councillor seats, including the School of Social Sciences seat. The outfit also won the key post of joint secretary at the traditionally Left-dominated university. The ABVP's influence over JNUSU's decision-making is set to rise multifold.

Indian envoy meets Taliban leadership amid diplomatic friction with PakistanTheir discussion focused on strengthening bilateral political relations, enhancing trade and transit cooperation, and exchanging views on recent regional developments.

Ignoring instructor, Army pilot's risky move led to deadly Washington crash: ReportCaptain Rebecca Lobach failed to follow her co-pilot and instructor Andrew Eaves's order to turn left in a bid to avoid the descending aircraft, ignoring his instructions just 15 seconds before the crash.

Woman finds Asian man hiding under bed in Japan hotel, shares scary experienceIn a video posted on Instagram, Natali narrated her scary experience that has triggered a discussion regarding security protocols in hotels.

26/11 plotter Tahawwur Rana's custody extended by NIA court for 12 daysThe National Investigation Agency (NIA) court on Monday extended the 26/11 terror attack accused Tahawwur Rana's custody for 12 days. He was taken to the NIA headquarters.

Government's stern message to BBC over its coverage of J&K terror attackIn an article titled 'Pakistan suspends visas for Indians after deadly Kashmir attack,' the BBC referred to the terror attack as a 'militant attack,' prompting the Narendra Modi government to write to the BBC's India head, Jackie Martin.

Provocative: India blocks Pakistani YouTube channels amid Pahalgam crackdown Live Updates The banned platforms, which collectively have around 63 million subscribers, include major Pakistani news channels such as Dawn News, Samaa TV, ARY News, Bol News, Raftar, Geo News, and Suno News.

sports.headline: India vs South Africa, Women's Tri-series: When and where to watch?Harmanpreet Kaur's India and Laura Wolvaardt's South Africa will face each other in the second match of the tri-series on Tuesday, April 29 at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.

On the other hand, GT will be eyeing the top spot on the points table with another commanding victory.

Death overs batting has not been easy in IPL 2025: Shahrukh KhanGujarat Titans batter Shahrukh Khan has said that batting in the death overs has not been easy in IPL 2025. The cricketer has explained that hitting the dry ball has been very difficult this season.

Prasidh Krishna talks about the art of death bowling in IPL 2025Fast bowler Prasidh Krishna has spoken about the art of death bowling in the Indian Premier League. Prasidh explained that the use of saliva has having a big impact in the final overs of the match.

At RCB, the veteran all-rounder is playing with a clear sense of belonging.

Conditions and toss just didn't play in our favour: Kevin Pietersen after loss vs RCBDelhi Capitals (DC) mentor Kevin Pietersen felt that the conditions and the toss didn't favour his team against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB)as they lost the match by six wickets at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi.

T20I comeback for Rahul? Pietersen backs DC star at No. 4 for IndiaIPL 2025, DC v RCB: Delhi Capitals' mentor Kevin Pietersen said that India should consider KL Rahul to bat at No.4 in T20Is. Rahul is currently the top run-getter for DC in the ongoing tournament.

Rishabh Pant fantastic as LSG captain, batting dip not due to price tag: ZaheerIPL 2025, MI vs LSG: Mentor Zaheer Khan praised Rishabh Pant's captaincy, saying the Lucknow Super Giants are not overtly worried about the batting form of their skipper. Pant has managed just 110 runs in nine innings in this season.

Mayank Yadav will bowl faster as he plays more in IPL 2025: Zaheer KhanIPL 2025: Lucknow Super Giants mentor and former India fast bowler Zaheer Khan on Sunday exuded confidence that express pacer Mayank Yadav's bowling speed will improve as he plays more matches in the IPL. The right-arm tearaway pacer Mayank made his comeback after a long injury lay-off, picking up two wickets against Mumbai Indians.

Watch: Virat Kohli teases KL Rahul, mimics iconic Chinnaswamy celebration in DelhiVirat Kohli brought light-hearted banter to RCB's big win over DC, cheekily mocking KL Rahul's "my home" celebration — with the two stars later sharing laughs as RCB continued their record-breaking away run in IPL 2025.

Kohli flaunts orthodox batting approach: Can't just come out and hitIPL 2025, DC vs RCB: Virat Kohli played a crucial role in Royal Challengers Bengaluru's six-wicket win over Delhi Capitals on Sunday at the Wankhede Stadium.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
